text: nan. Elu kolutta pacakkalai, elu melinta pacakkal tinpataiyum; elu pacamaiyana katirkalaiyum, veru (elu) kayntu (caviyaki vitta) katirkalaiyum titamaka nan kanavil kanten; piratanikale! Ninkal kanavu vilakkam kurak kutiyavarkalaka iruntal, ennutaiya (ik)kanavin palanai enakku ariviyunkal" enru (tam piratanikalaiyalaittu ekiptu nattu) aracar kurinar
